name: Grappling It
description:
Grapple It!

Grappling It is a game inspired by the arcade and NES era of games that leaves you to catch the stars before the time runs out with your trusty grappling hook! 

Controls: arrow keys and WASD.

Aim with your mouse or trackpad and click and hold to fire your grappling hook

NOT SUPPORTED FOR MOBILE

made for the retrograde jam!
